title: Related-Assets.Detect.Input
description: Profile-aware input for the Related-Assets.Detect capability.

profile.description: Optional reference to the org or system profile to load.

profilePatch.description: Optional modifications to apply to the loaded profile.

org_ref.description: Non-PII reference to the organization whose assets should be analyzed.

asset_names.description: List of asset names for which related assets should be detected.
